blogPost.title: What was it like to start a company and a family at the same time? Answer by Vlada Bortnik, founder of Marco Polo App. https://t.co/EAFkacHucR https://t.co/w2GAraqSbt
blogPost.author: Quora

localize.full_text: 会社と家庭を同時に立ち上げるのはどんな感じでしたか？回答：Vlada Bortnik（Marco Polo Appの創業者） https://t.co/EAFkacHucR https://t.co/w2GAraqSbt
同时成立公司和家庭是什么感觉？马可波罗App创始人Vlada Bortnik回答：https://t.co/EAFkacHucR https://t.co/w2GAraqSbt。
同時成立公司和家庭是什麼感覺？馬可波羅App創始人Vlada Bortnik回答：https://t.co/EAFkacHucR https://t.co/w2GAraqSbt。

previous.title: How do financial services vary outside of the US? Answer by @astrange, General Partner (FinTech) @a16z. https://t.co/zkv80LSHqQ https://t.co/lopOMrPMGe
